ygData.subject: RE: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm. I was using a Water Crystal Staff in Mistmoore and didn t have it proc once! Since I ve never used it in Mistmoore, I was thinking that maybe the zone was
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm. I was using a Water Crystal Staff in Mistmoore and didn't have it proc
once! Since I've never used it in Mistmoore, I was thinking that maybe the
zone was dampening the effect, but you've got me wondering now. When I used
it in Guk it would proc at least 2-3 times/fight.

Hmmm.

---Windleaf

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 8:19 AM
> To: Eqbards@...
> Subject: [eqbards] Post Patch Procing
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
> I'm not too concerned yet, but did anyone else playing last
> night notice a
> staggering drop in the number of procs that their weapons are
> firing? I was
> fighting Ogre Bouncers inside Oggok last night with my Ykesha
> and I believe
> the number of times it fired over the course of about 4 hours
> of play was
> either 2 or 3 - that's a very serious drop, perhaps an order
> of magnitude.
> The last hour or so I loaded up all of my DEX equipment and
> played Chant of
> Battle and had a DEX of 186 and didn't proc once. After
> killing Bouncers I
> ran over to Cazic-Thule and beat on some lizzies and gators
> for testing
> purposes (also 186 DEX) and got not a single proc while there
> (around 20
> solo kills).
>
> Crier Sharpsong
>
>
>
